scripts.test: npm run test:chrome && npm run test:firefox
scripts.test:chrome: npm run test:chrome:horizontal && npm run test:chrome:vertical
scripts.test:firefox: npm run test:firefox:horizontal && npm run test:firefox:vertical
scripts.test:chrome:horizontal: cross-env BROWSER=chrome ORIENTATION=horizontal mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:chrome:vertical: cross-env BROWSER=chrome ORIENTATION=vertical mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:firefox:horizontal: cross-env BROWSER=firefox ORIENTATION=horizontal mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:firefox:vertical: cross-env BROWSER=firefox ORIENTATION=vertical mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*.test.ts
